cause.description:
My New Red Shoes is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization that provides brand new clothing and shoes to homeless and low-income students in the San Francisco Bay Area for the first day of school. My New Red Shoes also creates a kids-helping-kids community by engaging students in service activities and teaching them about the issues of poverty and homelessness.
For more information, visit www.mynewredshoes.org
And, every time you shop online, donate a portion to My New Red Shoes! Check out FreePledge http://mynewredshoes.freepledge.com
1. All children deserve to start off the school year proud and ready to learn.
2. Children can be empowered to help others in their community.
3. www.mynewredshoes.org
cause.mission: To provide brand new clothing and shoes to homeless children in the Bay Area for the first day of school.
cause.name: My New Red Shoes
